result.description: Report including a full overview of the best practices in cancer survivors’ follow-up around Europe with particular attention to colorectal and breast cancer. result.title: Report on Dissemination activities and Update of the Dissemination Plan v1
result.description: This periodic deliverable will keep track of the dissemination activities performed in each period (e.g. conferences assisted, articles published, deliverables released and made accessible, etc.). The production of this document will reinforce the innovative and disruptive character of the project, reviewing the impact-achieving and explaining the adoption and global recognition of PIXEL partial advances. Associated task: T9.1, T9.2, T9.3 and T9.4.

result.title: Report on Advanced Safety Model for Bridges
result.description: The report will a present probabilistic basis for assessment of bridge structures for various travel modes. A number of novel techniques will be considered including; (i) System analysis, (ii) Load modelling, (iii) extreme value modelling and (iv)the effect of extreme weather events on bridges will be investigated in a manner which targets the likely future failures, considering well defined climate change models. The deliverable is linked to task 1.2.
